name: Sherlock: The Riddle of the Crown Jewels
name_original: Sherlock: The Riddle of the Crown Jewels
description:
Sherlock: The Riddle of the Crown Jewels is an adventure game developed by Infocom and Challenge. It came out on 01-01-1987. It was published by Infocom. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Sherlock: The Riddle of the Crown Jewels is available on Commodore / Amiga, Apple II, Classic Macintosh and PC.
